name: 32 in 1 Game Special
description:
Contains some content that may offend some players....... fantasy violence,killing
nudity,revealing outfits,sexual innuendo,crude language.



Why Play 1 Game When You Can Play 32?

Try you skills in a variety of game genres . This 32 in 1 collection will test your abilities in puzzle games, FPSs, shooters ,beat em ups and many more!

Short But Sweet..sometimes....

Most on the collection are more akin to arcade style play length for quick sessions, while others provide a lengthier challenge for those looking.

Scores,Speed Runs, Survival

Can you get the best possible score? How fast can you beat a game? Can you make it without losing too many lives? A little something for everyone.

Bla Bla Bla Anything Else?..

A salute to those cheap shareware and multi cart cartridges sold years ago that some of us have a bit of a soft spot. With nods
to the styles and quality of both, a bit of unusual humor and a few references you just might get, its possible you may enjoy yourself... or mabe you wont..I dunno...whatever..
